00036 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDGeometryInstance : public FCDEntityInstance
00037 {

00040     FCDMaterialInstanceContainer materials;

00043     FCDGeometryInstance(FCDocument* document, FCDSceneNode* parent, FCDEntity::Type entityType = FCDEntity::GEOMETRY);

00045 
00050     virtual Type GetType() const { return GEOMETRY; }
00051 
00052     // Access Bound Materials
00053     FCDMaterialInstance* FindMaterialInstance(const fchar* semantic);
00054     inline FCDMaterialInstance* FindMaterialInstance(const fstring& semantic) { return FindMaterialInstance(semantic.c_str()); }
00055     const FCDMaterialInstance* FindMaterialInstance(const fchar* semantic) const;
00056     inline const FCDMaterialInstance* FindMaterialInstance(const fstring& semantic) const { return FindMaterialInstance(semantic.c_str()); }
00057     inline size_t GetMaterialInstanceCount() const { return materials.size(); }
00058     inline FCDMaterialInstance* GetMaterialInstance(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < materials.size(), return NULL); return materials.at(index); }
00059     inline const FCDMaterialInstance* GetMaterialInstance(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < materials.size(), return NULL); return materials.at(index); }
00060     inline FCDMaterialInstanceContainer& GetMaterialInstances() { return materials; }
00061     inline const FCDMaterialInstanceContainer& GetMaterialInstances() const { return materials; }
00062     FCDMaterialInstance* AddMaterialInstance();
00063     FCDMaterialInstance* AddMaterialInstance(FCDMaterial* material, FCDGeometryPolygons* polygons);
00064     FCDMaterialInstance* AddMaterialInstance(FCDMaterial* material, const fchar* semantic);
00065     inline FCDMaterialInstance* AddMaterialInstance(FCDMaterial* material, const fstring& semantic) { return AddMaterialInstance(material, semantic.c_str()); }
00066
